trans-unit.source: Describes the interior of a graphics shape composed of rectangles and paths.
trans-unit.target: 指示由矩形和由路径构成的图形形状的内部。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A region is scalable because its coordinates are specified in world coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 区域是可缩放的因为其坐标指定的全局坐标。

trans-unit.source: On a drawing surface, however, its interior is dependent on the size and shape of the pixels representing it.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在绘图图面，其内部是依赖于的大小和形状的表示它的像素的。

trans-unit.source: An application can use regions to clip the output of drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用区域剪切的绘制操作的输出。

trans-unit.source: These regions are called clipping regions.
trans-unit.target: 这些区域称为剪辑区域。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using regions for clipping, see [How to: Use Clipping with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md).
trans-unit.target: 使用适用于剪辑区域的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 具有区域使用剪辑](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-clipping-with-a-region.md)。

trans-unit.source: An application can also use regions in hit-testing operations, such as checking whether a point or a rectangle intersects a region.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序还可以使用在命中测试的操作，例如检查点或矩形是否与某个区域相交的区域。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using regions for hit-testing, see [How to: Use Hit Testing with a Region](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md).
trans-unit.target: 使用区域进行命中测试的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用命中测试与区域](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-use-hit-testing-with-a-region.md)。

trans-unit.source: An application can fill a region by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRegion%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以通过使用填充区域<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRegion%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和一个<xref:System.Drawing.Brush>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到中黑色的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region using the first rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用第一个矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>, and adds the second rectangle to it.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>，并向其中添加第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Gets the complement of the region when combined with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
trans-unit.target: 获取与结合使用时的区域的求补<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>。

trans-unit.source: Fills the complement area with blue and draws it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 用蓝色填充求补区域并将其绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the area of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> that does not intersect with the region is colored blue.
trans-unit.target: 请注意的区域<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>不相交的区域的颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure to complement this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构，它是对此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的补充。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to contain the portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure that does not intersect with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />，以包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构中与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 不相交的部分。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure to complement this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构，它是对此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的补充。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to contain the portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that does not intersect with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />，以包含指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构中与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 不相交的部分。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到中黑色的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region using the first rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用第一个矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the complement of that region combined with the second rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 获取与第二个矩形结合使用该区域的求补。

trans-unit.source: Fills the complement area with blue and draws it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 用蓝色填充求补区域并将其绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the area of the second rectangle that does not intersect with the region is colored blue.
trans-unit.target: 请注意第二个不相交与区域的矩形区域颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> object to complement this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要对此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 对象进行补充的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to contain the portion of the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> that does not intersect with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 以包含与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 不相交的指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的那部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到为黑色屏幕

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates one region using the first rectangle and creates a second region using the second rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个使用第一个矩形的区域，并创建使用第二个矩形的第二个区域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the complement of that first region when combined with the second region.
trans-unit.target: 获取与第二个区域结合使用时的第一个区域的求补。

trans-unit.source: Fills the complement area with blue and draws it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 用蓝色填充求补区域并将其绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the area of the second region that does not intersect with the first region is colored blue.
trans-unit.target: 请注意与第一个区域不相交的第二个区域的区域颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="region" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="region" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Region> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A>允许使用的资源<xref:System.Drawing.Region>可以重新分配用于其他目的。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Region>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.Drawing.Region> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Drawing.Region>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Drawing.Region>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Region>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Region>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Region> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Drawing.Region> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Exclude%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Drawing.Region.%23ctor%2A>构造函数和<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Exclude%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Dispose%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form and call the `FillRegionExcludingPath` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`FillRegionExcludingPath`方法时处理该窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that represents a drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />，表示绘图图面。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> is identical to this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> on the specified drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 测试指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 是否与指定绘图图面上的此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 完全相同。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the interior of region is identical to the interior of this region when the transformation associated with the <paramref name="g" /> parameter is applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用了与 <paramref name="g" /> 参数关联的转换之后，区域的内部与此区域的内部完全相同，将为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current transformation of the graphics context `g` is used to compute the region interiors on the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 当前的图形上下文转换`g`用于计算区域内部绘图图面上的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="g" /> or <paramref name="region" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="g" /> 或 <paramref name="region" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the portion of its interior that does not intersect with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其内部与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构不相交的部分。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> to exclude from this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 中排除的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in black
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到为黑色屏幕

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle that intersects with the first and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建与第一个相交，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕的第二个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region using the first rectangle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the nonexcluded area of the region when combined with the second rectangle.

trans-unit.source: Fills the nonexcluded area with blue and draws it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 用蓝色填充未排除的区域，并将其绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the area of the area of the region that does not intersect with the rectangle is colored blue.
trans-unit.target: 请注意不相交的矩形区域的区域的区域颜色为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue.
trans-unit.target: 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到蓝方中的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates the second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region from the first rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建从第一个矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Determines if any portion of the rectangle intersects with the region.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否与该区域相交的矩形的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: Displays the `true` or `false` result on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 显示`true`或`false`在屏幕上的结果。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the rectangle intersects the region, so the result is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该矩形与相交区域，因此结果为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Create a form and paste the following code into it.

trans-unit.source: Call the `FillEmptyRegion` method in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Create a form and paste the following code into it.
trans-unit.target: 创建窗体并将下面的代码粘贴到其中。

trans-unit.source: Call the `FillEmptyRegion` method in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 调用`FillEmptyRegion`方法在窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The handle to the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Releases the handle of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的句柄。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="regionHandle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="regionHandle" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag" />.
trans-unit.target: 相关枚举<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> by which to transform this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于对此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" /> 进行变换的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: Transforms this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 变换此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到蓝方中的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region from the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建从矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Creates a transformation matrix and sets it to 45 degrees.
trans-unit.target: 创建的转换矩阵并将其设置为 45 度。

trans-unit.source: Applies the transformation to the region.
trans-unit.target: 将转换应用到区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the transformed region with red and draws the transformed region to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 有一个红色填充变换后的区域，并将转换后的区域绘制到以红色屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle is rotated 45 degrees from the original rectangle, shown in blue.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，红色矩形从原始的矩形，显示为蓝色的旋转 45 度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="matrix" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="matrix" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Offsets the coordinates of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的坐标偏移指定的量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> vertically.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Offsets the coordinates of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的坐标偏移指定的量。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`，这是一个参数的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a rectangle and draws it to the screen in blue.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个矩形，并将其绘制到蓝方中的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region from the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建从矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Applies the translation to the region.
trans-unit.target: 将转换应用到区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the translated region with red and draws the translated region to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 有一个红色填充的已翻译的区域，并将已翻译的区域绘制到以红色屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the red rectangle is shifted down and to the right from the original rectangle, shown in blue.
trans-unit.target: 请注意移动红色矩形向下并从原始矩形右侧显示为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> vertically.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Offsets the coordinates of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的坐标偏移指定的量。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Translate%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Translate%28System.Single%2CSystem.Single%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union of itself and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 的并集。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> to unite with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 合并的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union of itself and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 的并集。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Union%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29> and <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Union%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29>和<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure to unite with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 合并的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union of itself and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构的并集。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Union%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Union%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure to unite with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 合并的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union of itself and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构的并集。

trans-unit.source: The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> `e`。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in black.
trans-unit.target: 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到中黑色的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region using the first rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 创建使用第一个矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of union for `myRegion` when combined with `complementRect`.
trans-unit.target: 获取有关联合的区域`myRegion`与结合使用时`complementRect`。

trans-unit.source: Fills the fills the area of union with blue and draws it to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 用蓝色填充填充联合的区域，并将其绘制到屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Notice that both rectangles are filled with blue, including the area of overlap.
trans-unit.target: 请注意这两个矩形将填入蓝色，包括重叠区域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to unite with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 合并的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union of itself and the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 的并集。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Union%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29> and <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Union%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29>和<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="region" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="region" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> object to the union minus the intersection of itself with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 对象更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 对象的并集减去这两者的交集。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> to <see cref="Overload:System.Drawing.Region.Xor" /> with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 进行 <see cref="Overload:System.Drawing.Region.Xor" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union minus the intersection of itself with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> 的并集减去这两者的交集。

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Xor%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29> and <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Xor%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29>和<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Complement%28System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure to <see cref="Overload:System.Drawing.Region.Xor" /> with this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 进行 <see cref="Overload:System.Drawing.Region.Xor" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union minus the intersection of itself with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 结构的并集减去这两者的交集。

trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Drawing.Region.Xor%28System.Drawing.RectangleF%29>方法。

trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 进行 <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Region.Xor(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath)" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Updates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> to the union minus the intersection of itself with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Region" /> 更新为其自身与指定 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构的并集减去这两者的交集。

trans-unit.target: 该代码执行下列操作：

trans-unit.source: Creates the first rectangle and draws it to the screen in black.
trans-unit.target: 创建第一个矩形，并将其绘制到中黑色的屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a second rectangle and draws it to the screen in red.
trans-unit.target: 创建第二个矩形，并将其绘制到以红色屏幕。

trans-unit.source: Creates a region using the first rectangle.

trans-unit.source: Fills the <xref:System.Drawing.Region.Xor%2A> area with blue and draws it to the screen.
